    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2074</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2074</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Is Australia an English-speaking country?</string>
            <string language="en">Is Australia an English-speaking country?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ist Australien ein englischsprechendes Land?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Australie est-elle un pays d'expression anglaise
?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É Austrália um país english-speaking?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È l'Australia un paese anglofono?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι η Αυστραλία αγγλόφωνη χώρα;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva amb tres apartats sobre la geografia, l'anglès i la fauna d'Austràlia. Conté enllaços per ampliar-ne la informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) with three sections on Australian geography, English and fauna. It includes links for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Austràlia</string>
            <string language="en">Australia</string>
            <string language="es">Australia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) mit 
drei Kapiteln auf australischer Geographie, Englisch und Fauna. 
Er schließt Links für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) avec trois 
sections sur la géographie, l'anglais et la faune australiens. 
Elle inclut des liens pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) com três 
seções na geografia, no inglês e no fauna australian. Inclui 
as ligações para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) con tre 
sezioni su geografia, su inglese e su fauna australiani. Include
i collegamenti per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) με τρία 
τμήματα αυστραλιανών γεωγραφίας, αγγλικών και πανίδας. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις συνδέσεις για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Australien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Australie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Austrália</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Australia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυστραλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
